Articles.Content: Hello guys, there's some parts(actually, most of) are missing. And then I found out that there's something called infernal robotics expansion that I didn't download. But I can't find the download anywhere on the internet, so can anybody please help me out? I am now working on something like chicken walker, turtle walker and loader mech. Maybe I will share some of my works if you guys helped me out, you know some gifs and zips.

Infernal Robotics Model Rework - Core Pack

Infernal Robotics Model Rework - Expansion Pack

Infernal Robotics Model Rework - Utility Pack

Anybody has anyone of those mods?

Yep, are you after the old parts, like adjustable rail, closed/ open hinge, rotatron etc? Or zodius' new parts? Or all. Lol ? I had to mess about a bit to get em all. Not at my lappy atm, will edit later.

Anyway, my first robot is done. Here it is, the chicken walker. Hope you guys can have fun with it.https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=83192FDCBE009B83!202100&authkey=!AOdNtPlOl9IZwnM&ithint=file%2czip
